statements: DELETE FROM athlete_performance_metrics WHERE reps_completed > 10 AND time_taken < 30.0;
DELETE FROM athlete_performance_metrics WHERE athlete_id = 1 AND weight_lifted < 100.50;
DELETE FROM athlete_performance_metrics WHERE time_taken > 10.0 AND reps_completed <= 15;
DELETE FROM AthleteMetrics WHERE athlete_id = 100 AND weight_lifted > 200
DELETE FROM athlete_metrics WHERE athlete_id = 100 AND weight_lifted > 150.25;
